body:
Comment 2: 
Probably we need to touch runtime/sys_freebsd_arm.s too, it maybe require the same fix
of syscall/asm_freebsd_arm.s for broken misaligned system call traps; syscall6 and
syscall9. Looks like a generic development platform. cpu=1 versatile platform board on
qemu-1.5 or beyond can escape such traps, fortunately.
